settings.ubx_content: Curious about quality? No worries! Check out these authentic unboxing videos from real customers. Browse +3800 more honest reviews here.

settings.title: How can you offer such affordable art?
settings.answer:
This price is only possible due to the incredible artists involved. Without their honourable participation, we wouldn't exist.

The artists we work with normally sell their art themselves or on other platforms for much more. We collaborate with them and have limited releases of their artworks, linked to a specific charity organisation. The artworks are offered for a lower price to leave room for donations.

settings.title: Will the price effect the quality?
settings.answer: Founded by artists, rest assure that the quality of the product is our top priority. Some of us have been working with paper, details and perfection for over 20 years, and we use all our knowledge (and connections) to bring you something we truly can stand behind.

settings.title: How much actually goes to the cause?
settings.answer:
We collaborate directly with the charity organisations to help them raise awareness and funds for their important projects. Our mission is to create a better world through the power of art.

For each artwork, you can add a donation to a charity organisation of your choice. What you choose to donate will directly benefit the charity organisation.

So anything extra you can give will have a huge impact.

settings.title: How much do the artists get?
settings.answer: Founded by artists, we always want the artists to be fairly compensated as well. We know it's hours and hours of hard work behind each and every one of these artworks. That's why we offer the artists an upfront payment so everyone involved get compensated for their contribution.

settings.title: I really want to try it. But first, do you have any guarantee?
settings.answer: No worries. We offer 100% customer satisfaction. If by any chance you're not completely happy with your art or any part of your customer experience, neither are we. Just let us know and we will fix it!

settings.title: Free Shipping on All Orders Above
WE GIVE BACK, TOGETHER
settings.content:
“Merging good causes and epic art into something truly meaningful on your wall” - Variety

The idea was to create an art gallery never-before-seen. To make exclusive high-quality gallery art affordable for everyone, and at the same time make the customers own walls a part of a better future. 

Today, art and earth lovers all around the globe are giving anything from $1 to $200 extra for their limited edition artworks from award-winning artists, knowing that the more they chose to give, the more positive impact their new art creates.

settings.title: MEET ANDY
settings.content:
Announced a ”World Hero” by WWF, Andy has over 20 years of experience creating art that tells important stories.

Working hand-in-hand with organisations like UN, Non-Violence Project, Rainforest Trust, WWF, Share The Meal and many more, Andy understands the needs of the communities being served and the power art has to raise awareness.

Art for Causes is the product born after 20 years of networking with amazing artists all around the globe, and important organisations of all sizes. And a need to do more.

Click here for an interview with Andy
15min read

settings.title: Handmade gallery frames for the perfect presentation
settings.content:
Our high quality frames are available in black, white and beautiful light oak. The glass consists of a high quality acrylic glass that is light and shatter-free for a safe home!

Best of all? Our frames works both ways! You can hang them vertically and horizontally.

Frame width: 12 mm
Depth: 22 mm
Material: Pine Wood / Solid Oak

Click here for full product description.

settings.title: Popup
settings.content:
Give to yourself and give back

Our mission is to support charity and artists while providing stunning art to customers at the world's most affordable price. 

Through unique collaborations we can release limited edition art at never-before-seen prices, leaving room for a personal donation to a charity of your choice.

And the best part?

These limited edition drops help to bring important environmental stories into homes and workspaces all around the world creating critical dialogue and inspiring positive action.

Click here for learn more about our charity partners.

settings.title: Popup
settings.content:
TAKE YOUR ART TO THE NEXT LEVEL

Make your artwork complete by adding a mat board (aka passepartout) and elevate the look and feel of your art even further.

It's an absolutely stunning method of framing your piece. 

Our high quality mat board comes in a custom cut thin design, the preferred choice for galleries and artists all around the world.

Sizes:
Medium (12x16" / 30x40cm) - Mat width: 1.0" / 2.5cm
Large (20x28" / 50x70cm) - Mat width: 1.2" / 3.0cm
X-Large (28x40" / 70x100cm) - Mat width: 1.6" / 4.0cm

Material:
Age-Resistant, 100% FSC® certified paper. Acid-free.

Note: The mat board is placed on top of the Fine Art print and covers a little bit of the artwork.

settings.title: HOW OUR PRICES ARE MADE POSSIBLE
settings.content:
It’s not a sale. It’s a commitment to do more good.  

We establish close collaborations with charitable organisations all across the world, to find strategic ways to help them spread awareness with the power of art.

With the organisation, we then reach out to the world’s most talented artists to figure out a way to make limited releases at a never-before-seen price, leaving room for people to make a donation with their purchase. 

Our business model is kind of crazy (and a lot of work), but a huge win-win for all.

Especially for our planet.

By purchasing an artwork for a cause, you become a part of our good community. A 100% free membership where the only thing YOU have to do, is keep spreading the word of the true value behind your art. 

We truly believe it's the best art deal in the world.

Hopefully, you feel the same.

Want to know more? Click here

settings.content:
Please fill in the form below with any questions you might have about your order, our products or exciting collaborations. We'll get back to you within 24 hours, but usually much faster.


Of course, you can always drop us an email at:

You can also find a lot of the information you might be looking for in our FAQs.
